RoboCup 2D Simulation League agent software

Class List
Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
futility::BallExtension of MobileObject that represents a ball on the visible playing field
futility::BrainThreaded class that contains the player agent's sensory data parsing and strategy computation algorithms
futility::CircleCircle class facilitating player triangulation
futility::ClientNetwork client that initializes a connection to the RoboCup 2D soccer server
futility::Settings::CommandsConstant string literals representing the commands a client may send to the server
futility::DirectionEstimateAn estimate of a direction, with confidence
futility::EstimateAn estimate of a value
futility::FieldObjectExtension of GameObject; represents a given object on the playing field
futility::FlagAn extension of StationaryObject that represents a visible flag on the field
futility::GameObjectAbstract superclass that represents any visible object on the field
futility::GoalExtension of StationaryObject to represent a visible goal on the playing field
futility::MainContains start-up subroutines for initializing the game client according to specified command-line parameters
futility::MobileObjectExtension of FieldObject representing an object that can move
futility::PlayerRepresentation of a player on the field
futility::PointClass representation of a point on a 2D plane, with helper functions for finding distance and angles between Point objects
futility::PositionEstimateAn estimate of a position, with confidence
futility::RectangleClass representation of a rectangular area on the playing field
futility::SettingsStatic class that stores all client parameters based on information known about the simulation
futility::StationaryObjectData structure extension of FieldObject that represents a stationary object on the playing field
futility::TeamThe player agent's conception of a team, including the team's name and its side
